name: gsiDispatch
description:
Dispatch of green energy has two aspects to consider:
  - Availability of gerneration facility (depends on weather and installed capacity)
  - Demand of energy
Using the green power index (Gr√ºnstromIndex) we have received a tool to automate distribution of energy in order to prevent redispatch situations. Doing this alows to opimize resource usage (tactical) and leverage data for investment planning (strategic).

zip.description: Zipcode (Postleitzahl) of a city in Germany.

$ul: **avg_distance_km**: Averaged geospatial distance in kilometers between energy generation and usage at requested location.
**dispatch_from**: List of current sources of green energy (into requested location)
**dispatch_target**: List of current targets of green energy (out of requested location)
**postmix**: Green Energy Mix after dispatch of given city
**premix**: Green Energy Mix prior to dispatch of given city
**end**: Ending time of window evaluated for this request/dispatches.
**start**: Starting time of window evaluated in order to get dispatches
